name: ARAppClipCodeAnchor
desc: An anchor that tracks the position and orientation of an App Clip Code in the physical environment.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL encoded in an App Clip Code.

items.name: var urlDecodingState: ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState
items.desc: A state that indicates the process of decoding an App Clip Code URL.

items.name: enum ARAppClipCodeAnchor.URLDecodingState
items.desc: The states in the process of decoding an App Clip code URL.

items.name: var radius: Float
items.desc: The App Clip Code's radius in meters.
